title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red Eddie Collins - SOLD!
author: judgebuck

posts.post_title: FS:  T3 Turkey Red Eddie Collins - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Collins is now only $220 plus $5 for S & H.  I will cover the remaining S & H and will insure the card.  First buyer couldn't get the money.  It has corner wear and two light creases at top left corner.  Also, there is a small tear in the left border.  I assume it is a tear, but I didn't want to pull it apart to see if it was a crease or a tear.  But, I think it's a tear.  the Chase card and the Willis card are sold.

[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii21/dbuck01/IMG_0024.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii21/dbuck01/IMG_0025.jpg[/IMG]
Email sent.
Have responded to emails and sent scans.  Thanks to all for your interest.   David
If Chase has the Turkey Red Ad back, I'll take it....otherwise, I'd like a scan - [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Chase does not have Turkey Red back.  So, I'll email you a scan of the back.  David
I did not get a response.

Matt,

Scans resent.

David

Sorry to all , but my email is having trouble sending the scans.  Perhaps, because they are so big.  David :(  I would post pics here if I knew how.  Is it like on Collectors Universe forum?  I've tried again and hope they show.

Scan of Chase back.  david

[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii21/dbuck01/IMG-3.jpg[/IMG]
Collins has what appears to be a small tear in left border.  I am afraid to try to see if it separates to determine whether or not it is a tear, but it appears to be.  David
ill take the chase!
Thanks Sean.  The Chase is now sold.  Collins is still available.
wrong back on the Collins. #40 is Willis

Thanks for noting my error.  I have posted a scan of the Collins back.  Also, whlle I will be away from here until Friday night, the first person to respond with an offer of $275 delivered gets the Collins.  Thanks to everyone for their interest.

[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii21/dbuck01/IMG-4.jpg[/IMG]
Chase and Willis are SOLD.  Collins is reduced to $250.
PM sent on the T3 Collins
Collins now sold, as well as Chase and Willis.  Thanks to all.
I have edited the original post in this thread to show the current price ($250) and the card's front and back scans.  I had a buyer earlier, but he couldn't get the money.
I started this card at $350.  Then went down and down to $250.  Now only $220 plus $5 for S & H with me paying the remaining S & H including insurance.
Collins is now sold, too.  Thanks to all for your purchases.  Enjoy your T3's!
